title: GMX.Usdt (Y22.P3.E1).Livermore target
name: ssari
contents:
Hi All,

GMX is one of those I'm looking to get the bottom for accumulation and go long.

For now, we have made a top to only pullback like #OP to a base accumulation range.
With a ABC correction, we could have a breakout descending wedge trade very much in like a rise wedge breakout entry.

Note how its aligned with the Livermore ( broadening wedge ) structure.



Please give me a like and share,


All the best,

S.SAri

title: XAUUSD - H4
name: arongroups
contents: It seems that gold has broken its downward channel in the four-hour time frame and is ready to move towards 1680. According to the upcoming news of the unemployment rate and average hourly income and the change in non-agricultural employment, it can gold up to the level of 1700.

title: BTC/USD  Long term buy and sell levels. Economy collapse
name: bisserotta
contents:
Bears are in control but we might get relief rally before going down

Looks like the whole europe and its economy is collapsing when you look at eur/usd and gbp/usd or any currency here. Obviously after that the rest of the west and world but usd might get stronger for a short time, but when economy crashes everything goes down, so my buy and sell orders are these.

Levels in chart.

Im not professional trader, so this is not trading advice.

title: üî• QNT Inverse Head & Shoulders: Bullish Move Expected
name: FieryTrading
contents:
Some time ago I made an analysis on QNT where I discussed the potential for an inverse head & shoulders pattern, which has now been confirmed by yesterday's break out.


In my view, it's likely that we're going to see further upside for QNT . Targets in blue. Be aware that the overall market is quite bearish at the moment, so manage your portfolio accordingly.

title: Chainlink (LINK) to $48
name: without_worries
contents:
On the above 2-day chart price action has corrected 90% from $52 despite the best efforts from the maxis . Missed my $3 target by a couple of dollars. Now is an excellent moment for long positions. Why?

1) The ‚Äòincredible buy‚Äô signal prints. On the 2-day, don't ignore.

2) Price action resistance breakout.

3) RSI resistance breakout. This is huge. 2 long years of resistance. The number of bulls on Chainlink during this period was incredible. Lesson, RSI resistance in play? DO NOTHING. You must wait for confirmation of a breakout. That is now confirmed.

4) Regular bullish divergence . 11 oscillators are currently bullish divergence across a 2-month period.

5) Lastly the 2-day BTC pair (below). For the last 2 years price action has been printing within a sizeable bull flag . 3 rejections from the upper channel whilst the above RSI resistance has been active. The 4th attempt will likely break through. IF that happens Chainlink will make a 2000% gain against Bitcoin .

Is it possible price action falls further? Sure.

Is it probable? No and no.

Ww

PS: not in this trade, you must ask for updates below, following Ww is not a strategy.

Type: trade
Risk: 6% of portfolio
Timeframe: You know, I‚Äôve no idea.
Return: 500% and if $48 becomes support, we‚Äôll look at it then.


2-day BTC pair
Trade active: Support on past resistance confirmed with the BTC pair. A big move is in the post.
Trade active: The weekly chart confirms support on past resistances. This is a sure thing.
Comment: 70% move about to occur on LINK / BTC pair
Trade active: breakout - the next move should be over $9
Comment: Thought the interweb would be all over this Life cross on the BTC pair, but not so much as a whisper..

Comment: Holly Molly Chainlink is looking incredibly bullish. And I don‚Äôt even hold it.

Monthly BTC pair

title: Jasmy coin coming back to the buy zone?
name: vf_investment
contents:
Jasmy is close to the support zone again. We expect it to retest the support which is a great spot to buy this coin and hold it for a mid-term.

If support breaks, better sell your jasmy coin as there¬¥s no more support and the price will enter the price discovery to the downside. It can go very low.

Comment: The price broke below the range.
If you hold Jasmy , you can sell if you get a bounce. The range should act as a resitance now

title: LUNC - Next Entry Point
name: NewtonsWave
contents:
The next approximate entry point is around 27/09/2022 18.00pm (London Time).*

This is Based on Newtons Wave, The Fib Timeline and the sine wave movement.

The next stop will be around 0.00055

Time to load up :-)

**READ**

Why Timing Is a Constant Variable

Time and sine waves are connected from peak to peak. They are a constant. They never change.

However, the time it takes to travel from peak to peak is variable.

Timing from peak to peak is based on Frequency of trades not volume . So, real time can shrink or stretch.

For example, imagine everyone stopped trading the coin. It would just freeze. If the whole world started buying and selling a particular crypto currency, then it would get travel peak to peak quicker.

That's why you should wait for the peaks on Newtons Wave to get drawn out. The count of the peaks is equal to the 4 parts of the circle.

That is why Sine has 2 time frames.

title: NKN - 100x opportunity
name: without_worries
contents:
On the above 1-day chart price action has corrected 95% since April 2021. A number of reasons now exist to be long, including:

1) The ‚Äòincredible buy‚Äô signal.

2) Broken price action and RSI resistance.

3) Price action is testing past resistance (green line), look at the weekly chart below.

4) Price action has corrected to the golden ratio (see weekly chart below).

5) Nudge nudge wink wink. Don‚Äôt know what I mean? Shame.

Is it possible price action falls further? Sure.

Is it probable? no.

Ww


Type: trade
Risk: <=6% of portfolio
Timeframe: don‚Äôt know.
Return: $8 or 100x


Weekly chart

3-day BTC pair

Trade active: Don't worry about trying to time the bottom, not with a 100x opportunity.
Comment: The 3-day appears to have confirmed the support off past resistance.
Trade active: Wedge breakout + the 'pi-cycle' bottom indicator illuminated.
Comment: A big move is coming..
Comment: The BTC 3-day pair (someone asked below)
Trade active: We're styling... get this idea over 100 likes and I'll commit to identifying the top.

Comment: BTC pair for NKN confirms Bull Flag breakout. You think 50% today was a lot?
A measured move from Wave 1 'bull flag' break out takes price action to just under 4000% for Wave 3.

Trade active: Another 12hr resistance breakout.

1) Price action breaks out of past resistance.

2) Corrects and stops on past resistance as support.

3) Support is also the golden ratio.

Isn't that fantastic? We can now forecast a 50% move in a relatively short space of time. However this idea has far far more upside on the larger time frames.

PS: Not trading this. If you want me to post updates with swing trade opportunities, ask below.

Comment: Probably a good moment as price action breaks out of resistance
Trade active

To users of the indicator, scan through the 4hr charts, you'll find those IB buy signals quite quickly.

Comment: Some education

This was NKN before it blew up - was there a tell tell sign? Yes.


Can you see the dash purple line? The 100-week SMA

Rules:

1) A candle has already close as support. It can be a DOJI or an indecision candle.

2) A ‚ÄòGreat buy‚Äô or ‚Äòincredible buy‚Äô signal preceded.

This is POND before a 30% move.


Go through the ideas I‚Äôve published, look at the BTC pairs.

Here‚Äôs a freebie - Alchemy Pay (ACH)

Have gone through a number of others, you‚Äôll have to look. Simply put, a very few number of alt tokens are doing this right now.


Ww

Comment: Another BTC pair printing on the 100-day (actually 2-day/50-day SMA).

If you can't find a public MA on tradingview to print the 2-day/50-day SMA then message me and I'll share the one you see in my charts above.

title: BTC - One last chance
name: Mendenmein-Capital
contents:
Dear subscribers and visitors


First things first ‚Äì the bearish signs in bitcoin are increasing and we are in a difficult situation.

In our last update we expected that bitcoin would establish a bottom and were more optimistic about the upcoming weeks. However the harsh dump from last Tuesday (13 september) gave us reason to suspect that bitcoin hasn‚Äôt fully finished his great correction since 68K.

We want to inform our subscribers and traders on this platform about our two scenarios, of which one will surely unfold in the next days. Our team created a last bullish scenario for bitcoin and a more unsettling bearish scenario, both are shown below and we recommend to study them well.



The (last) bullish scenario: Bitcoin 1D

In the past weeks we highlighted the importance of the last low in bitcoin , this low can be seen as a major support at 17605$. As long as bitcoin doesn‚Äôt break below this support the bulls have still a chance to establish a bottom and with increasing buying interest we could recover back to prices above 30K.

However most indicators have reversed their stance and are pointing towards a last painful capitulation to 13K or even 11K.





The bearish scenario: Bitcoin 1D

Bitcoin‚Äôs price action shows an overall increasing bearish sentiment, as mentioned above most indicators are printing ‚Äúfresh‚Äù sell-signals. Our team studied the movements of the last months and came to the conclusion that one last wave 5 could unfold. This wave 5 as shown on the chart below will throw bitcoin below the important mark of 17605$.

With this movement a downwards impulse could unload it‚Äôs full power and many investors will suffer heavy losses as a result of this. On the chart this impulse is marked as violet and a strong wave 1 ‚Äì wave 2 setup has already established itself.






Final worlds: We will continue to watch the market very closely and whatever scenario will unfold ‚Äì we will work hard to give investors a chance to capitalize on them.


We hope that we can empower traders through our analysis ‚Äì greetings from Switzerland!

Written by:
Benjamin Mendenmein

title: AUDUSD: Fake Move Monday? üö®
name: AlkalineFX
contents:
Let's start our analysis with AUDUSD:

By studying my chart, you will notice that price has not yet reached an area of strong supply or demand, it is simply trading around an imaginary trendline.

Sentiment shows us that 66% of traders are long and the day has started bullish . Could this be an early invitation for buyers to start the week? When traders open their screens and see this bullish momentum, they may feel FOMO that they will miss the longs.

For this reason, I am set mostly on bearish momentum and will be locating the ideal area to sell from later in the day.

title: GOLD: BIGGEST Liquidity Point Ever üö®
name: AlkalineFX
contents:
Gold is creating a huge liquidity trap for buyers using this current zone as support.

We may have some relief from the support but this will only be a trap to lure more buyers in.

It is highly likely that the buy side liquidity is going to be swept before market maker buyers intervene and push price back into the highs.

üöÄThanks for your BOOSTS and supportüöÄ

title: üî• Worst Case Scenario For Alt-Coins: Huge Risk Potential
name: FieryTrading
contents:
To start of the discussion, I want to stress that history rarely repeats itself, but it often rhymes. BTC has, thus far, lost around 85% of its value from top to bottom after every bull-cycle thus far. Can the same be said for alts?

In the previous cycle, the total altcoin marketcap (which is the total marketcap minus ETH and BTC ) lost around 92% of its total value, which translates to every altcoin losing around 92% of its value on average.

Since BTC follows a boom & bust cycle with the bust being around -85%, there's a reason to believe that alts will do a similar thing. In that case, alts have another huge 70% drop ahead of them. Naturally, this would be my absolute worst case scenario for alts which could only occur when there's a total meltdown of the stock markets (like 2008).

On the other hand, I doubt it will ever get this far. There's a lot of decent alts around and investors are not flocking to BTC as fast as they did in previous cycles, hence why the BTC dominance is still this low. Nevertheless, it never hurts to explore different potential scenario's.
